sourcing.instructions: Silver can be purchased from jewelry supply stores or online metal suppliers.
steps: Silver can be purchased from jewelry supply stores or online metal suppliers.
1. Measure 10 grams of silver, 6 grams of potassium, and 2 grams of tin using a digital scale for accuracy.
